Title: Bootstrap Django project
Body:
Create Django project with apps: accounts, storefronts, catalog, orders, commissions, blog, pages, notifications.

Acceptance:
- Project runs locally with docker-compose.
- .env support.
- README with run instructions.

Title: User registration & login (email/password)
Body: Enable registration/login/logout. Email verification required for creator storefront creation.

Title: Creator storefront creation wizard
Body: Wizard to create storefront slug, name, avatar, banner, bio, links. Preview before publish.

Title: Cart & checkout with Stripe
Body: Cart (session + authenticated), checkout, webhooks for payment success. Handle 3DS and order state updates.

Title: Commission request form builder
Body: Creator-defined constraints (size, medium, palette, budget, deadline); per-creator pricing rules.

Title: Blog post CRUD with drafts & schedule
Body: Markdown editor, cover image, tags; scheduled publish.
